title: Children's thought and language
creator_credit: Michael Forlong Productions and Stefan Sargent Productions
brief_description:
Episode of Series “Looking at Research”.
The film outlines a project sponsored by the Social Science Research Council to study childhood development of intelligence and to discover how much children understand.
